column1: :Roäc comes to the Dwarves after Smaugs death. He is voiced by John Wyse.
:"Rwaak son of Kwaak" informs the Dwarves of Smaugs demise. He is voiced by an uncredited Pat Franklyn.

column3: is given game statistics and a short description.

column1: : "Roäc the Raven" is a Diplomat Ally
column2: playable at any site in Northern Rhovanion.

column1: 2014: The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies:
: Roäc does not explicitly appear. However
column2: just prior to the final confrontation with the Elves of Mirkwood Army assembled before the gates
column3: a raven is seen flying away from the gate of Lonely Mountain
column4: then just before Dáin Ironfoots Army of Dwarves arrives
column5: the raven is seen flying back to Thorin at the gate.  This visually implies that Thorin sent a message with this raven
column6: though it is not explained in dialogue
column7: and the raven itself does not talk.
